# Invitation to Bid (ITB)
## Invitation Title and Tender Reference
Title: Irrigation Infrastructure Condition Assessment and Master Plan for the Lethbridge Research and Development Centre
Tender Reference: cb-924-23991496

## Tender Details
* Solicitation Number: 01R11-25-061
* Amendment Number: 2
* Amendment Date: 2024-07-30
* Publication Date: 2024-06-20
* Tender Closing Date and Time: 2024-07-30 13:00:00
* Tender Status: Expired
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Unspecified

## Project Overview
The request for proposal seeks a consultant to undertake a condition assessment of the irrigation infrastructure at the Lethbridge Research and Development Centre (LRDC) and develop a master plan with a ten (10) year replacement schedule. The successful bidder will provide a consistent measure of the infrastructure's condition and develop a plan to define infrastructure improvements and replacement priorities.

## Mandatory Technical Requirements
* The consultant must have expertise in irrigation infrastructure condition assessment and master planning.
* The consultant must develop a cost estimate for the proposed infrastructure improvements and replacement schedule.

## Notice and Documents
* Documents are available for download through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/solicitation-opportunities.
* A list of documents is available on the GETS website, including the Request for Proposal, Appendices, and Solicitation Documents.

## Security and Integrity
* There are no security requirements associated with this project.
* The Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada applies to this procurement.
